rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area adjacent to the entrance, good natural light; incorporates wheelchair accessible pathways

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated with living room and kitchen, open space design, wheelchair-friendly

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern colonial kitchen with accessibility features such as lowered counters; integrated ventilation and natural light
